mapper.select: SELECT t.track_id, tr.title AS track_title, tg.name AS mood_name, COUNT(*) AS vote_count FROM track_mood_vote t JOIN tag tg ON t.mood = tg.id JOIN track tr ON t.track_id = tr.id GROUP BY t.track_id, tr.title, tg.name ORDER BY t.track_id, vote_count DESC
SELECT id, user_id, track_id, mood FROM track_mood_vote ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, user_id, track_id, mood FROM track_mood_vote WHERE track_id = #{trackId} ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO track_mood_vote (user_id, track_id, mood) VALUES (#{userId}, #{trackId}, #{mood})
mapper.select: SELECT tg.name FROM track_mood_vote tmv JOIN tag tg ON tmv.mood = tg.id GROUP BY tg.name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 3
